content: a top-down circular yoke cardigan for babies in three sizes this pattern does involve some flat stranded knitting so be forewarned this is a good pattern to try if you are a first-time stranded stockinette knitter or a first time sweater knitter as there are only a few row of stranded patterning and there is virtually no seaming pattern includes colrwork charts and an abbreviation glossary skills required/taught in this pattern m1 increase stranded patterning picking up stitches also available in french
